00039 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 bool Cuboid::Move(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00041         for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++) {
00042                 v[i].x += p.x;
00043                 v[i].y += p.y;
00044                 v[i].z += p.z;
00045         }
00046         return true;
00047 }
00048 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 bool Cuboid::Move1(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00050         // v[0] can be anywhere 
00051         for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++)
00052                 v[i] = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00053         return true;
00054 }
00055 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 bool Cuboid::Move2(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00057         // v[1] can be anywhere 
00058         v[1] = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00059         return true;
00060 }
00061 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 bool Cuboid::Move3(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00063         // v[2] must be on a line perpendicular to p1p2 and intersecting v[1]
00064         // (1) convert all to the floor plane coordinates
00065         CvPoint3D32f pp = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00066         CvPoint3D32f pp1 = v[0];
00067         CvPoint3D32f pp2 = v[1];
00068         CvPoint2D32f P = cvPoint2D32f(pp.x, pp.y), P1 = cvPoint2D32f(pp1.x, pp1.y), P2 = cvPoint2D32f(pp2.x, pp2.y);
00069         // (2) p_ = p proj p1p2
00070         double u = ((P.x-P1.x)*(P2.x-P1.x)+(P.y-P1.y)*(P2.y-P1.y))/d_2(P1, P2);
00071         CvPoint P_ = cvPoint((int)(P1.x+u*(P2.x-P1.x)), (int)(P1.y+u*(P2.y-P1.y)));
00072         // (3) v[2] = v[1] + (p-p_)
00073         CvPoint3D32f P3 = cvPoint3D32f(0,0,0), P4 = cvPoint3D32f(0,0,0);
00074         P3.x = P2.x + (P.x-P_.x);
00075         P3.y = P2.y + (P.y-P_.y);
00076         P4.x = P1.x + P3.x - P2.x;
00077         P4.y = P1.y + P3.y - P2.y;
00078 
00079         v[2] = P3;
00080         v[3] = P4;
00081         v[4] = v[0]; v[5] = v[1]; v[6] = v[2]; v[7] = v[3];
00082         return true;
00083 }
00084 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 bool Cuboid::Move4(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00086         // must be on a line perpendicular to plane v0v1v2v3 and intersecting v[2]
00087         // essentially v[6].z-v[2].z = h
00088         double h = doc->cameramodel.computeZ(p, v[2]);
00089         v[4] = cvPoint3D32f(v[0].x, v[0].y, h);
00090         v[5] = cvPoint3D32f(v[1].x, v[1].y, h);
00091         v[6] = cvPoint3D32f(v[2].x, v[2].y, h);
00092         v[7] = cvPoint3D32f(v[3].x, v[3].y, h);
00093         return true;
00094 }
00095 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void Cuboid::DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00097         CvPoint pf1 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[0]);
00098         CvPoint pf2 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[1]);
00099         CvPoint pf3 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[2]);
00100         CvPoint pf4 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[3]);
00101 
00102         cvLine(frame, pf1, pf2, color, 2, CV_AA);
00103         cvLine(frame, pf2, pf3, color, 2, CV_AA);
00104         cvLine(frame, pf3, pf4, color, 2, CV_AA);
00105         cvLine(frame, pf4, pf1, color, 2, CV_AA);
00106 
00107         // Draw label text
00108         int leftMost = min(min(pf1.x, pf2.x), min(pf3.x, pf4.x));
00109         //int rightMost = max(max(pf1.x, pf2.x), max(pf3.x, pf4.x));
00110         int center = (pf1.y+pf2.y+pf3.y+pf4.y)/4;
00111         drawTextInRectangle(label, cvPoint(leftMost, center), frame, CV_RGB(0,0,0), CV_RGB(255,255,150), (float)1);
00112 }
00113 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 void Cuboid::DrawFloor(CDC* pDC, int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {
00115         // draw vertices
00116         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(pen);
00117         int leftMost = INT_MAX, rightMost = INT_MIN, center = 0;
00118         CvPoint im[NPTS/2];
00119         for (int i=0;i<NPTS/2;i++) {
00120                 im[i] = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[i]);
00121                 pDC->Ellipse(im[i].x-DOT-ox, im[i].y-DOT-oy, im[i].x+DOT-ox, im[i].y+DOT-oy);
00122                 if (im[i].x < leftMost)
00123                         leftMost = im[i].x;
00124                 if (im[i].x > rightMost)
00125                         rightMost = im[i].x;
00126                 center += im[i].y;
00127         }
00128         center /= NPTS/2;
00129 
00130         // draw edges
00131         CPoint off = CPoint(-ox, -oy);
00132         CPen base(PS_SOLID, 0, RGB(0, 255, 255)); pDC->SelectObject(base);
00133         pDC->MoveTo(cPoint(im[0])+off);pDC->LineTo(cPoint(im[1])+off);
00134         pDC->MoveTo(cPoint(im[1])+off);pDC->LineTo(cPoint(im[2])+off);
00135         pDC->MoveTo(cPoint(im[2])+off);pDC->LineTo(cPoint(im[3])+off);
00136         pDC->MoveTo(cPoint(im[3])+off);pDC->LineTo(cPoint(im[0])+off);
00137 
00138         // draw label
00139         int TEXT_HEIGHT = 16;
00140         CRect rToolTip(leftMost-ox,center-TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy, rightMost-ox, center+TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy);
00141         drawStaticToolTip(pDC, label, rToolTip);
00142 
00143         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00144         return; 
00145 }

00150 void Cuboid::DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {
00151         // draw vertices
00152         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(pen);
00153         int leftMost = INT_MAX, rightMost = INT_MIN, center = 0;

00157 //              echo(String::Concat(__box(v[i].x), S" ", __box(v[i].y),  S" ",__box(v[i].z)));
00158                 pDC->Ellipse(im[i].x-DOT-ox, im[i].y-DOT-oy, im[i].x+DOT-ox, im[i].y+DOT-oy);

00166 
00167         // draw edges
00168         CPoint off = CPoint(-ox, -oy);
00169         CPen base(PS_SOLID, 0, RGB(0, 255, 255)); pDC->SelectObject(base);
00170         CPoint pts[2*NPTS];
00171         DWORD cnts[] = {4, 4, 4, 4};
00172 
00173         if (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType == SPHERICAL && d(im[0], im[1]) > doc->cameramodel.w/2) {
00174                 rightMost = leftMost*2; leftMost = 0;
00175                 pts[1] = cPoint(im[0])+off;

00183                 if (v[0].y > v[1].y) {
00184                         pts[0] = cPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2)+off;
00185                         pts[3] = cPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2)+off;

00189                         pts[11] = cPoint(0, (im[7].y+im[6].y)/2)+off;

00191                         pts[15] = cPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2)+off;
00192                 }
00193                 else {
00194                         pts[0] = cPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2)+off;
00195                         pts[3] = cPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2)+off;
00196                         pts[4] = cPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2)+off;
00197                         pts[7] = cPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2)+off;
00198                         pts[8] = cPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2)+off;

00201                         pts[15] = cPoint(0, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2)+off;

00204         }

00240                 pts[0] = cPoint(im[0])+off;
00241                 pts[1] = cPoint(im[1])+off;

00266 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00267 void Cuboid::RasterizeFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00268         CvPoint im[NPTS];
00269         for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++)
00270                 im[i] = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(v[i]));
00271 
00272         CvPoint pts[2*NPTS];
00273 
00274         if (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType == SPHERICAL && d(im[0], im[1]) > doc->cameramodel.w/2) {
00275                 pts[1] = im[0];
00276                 pts[2] = im[3];
00277                 pts[5] = im[2];
00278                 pts[6] = im[1];
00279                 pts[9] = im[4];
00280                 pts[10] = im[7];
00281                 pts[13] = im[6];
00282                 pts[14] = im[5];
00283                 if (v[0].y > v[1].y) {
00284                         pts[0] = cvPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2);
00285                         pts[3] = cvPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2);
00286                         pts[4] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2);
00287                         pts[7] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2);
00288                         pts[8] = cvPoint(0, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2);
00289                         pts[11] = cvPoint(0, (im[7].y+im[6].y)/2);
00290                         pts[12] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[7].y+im[6].y)/2);
00291                         pts[15] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2);
00292                 }
00293                 else {
00294                         pts[0] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2);
00295                         pts[3] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2);
00296                         pts[4] = cvPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[2].y)/2);
00297                         pts[7] = cvPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[0].y)/2);
00298                         pts[8] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2);
00299                         pts[11] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[7].y+im[6].y)/2);
00300                         pts[12] = cvPoint(0, (im[7].y+im[6].y)/2);
00301                         pts[15] = cvPoint(0, (im[5].y+im[4].y)/2);
00302                 }
00303                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[0], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00304                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[4], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00305                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[8], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00306                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[12], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00307                 CvPoint v1[] = {pts[0], pts[1], pts[9], pts[8]};
00308                 CvPoint v2[] = {pts[2], pts[3], pts[11], pts[10]};
00309                 CvPoint v3[] = {pts[4], pts[5], pts[13], pts[12]};
00310                 CvPoint v4[] = {pts[6], pts[7], pts[15], pts[14]};
00311                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v1, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00312                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v2, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00313                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v3, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00314                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v4, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00315         }
00316         else if (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType == SPHERICAL && d(im[1], im[2]) > doc->cameramodel.w/2) {
00317                 pts[1] = im[0];
00318                 pts[2] = im[1];
00319                 pts[5] = im[2];
00320                 pts[6] = im[3];
00321                 pts[9] = im[4];
00322                 pts[10] = im[5];
00323                 pts[13] = im[6];
00324                 pts[14] = im[7];
00325                 if (v[1].y > v[2].y) {
00326                         pts[0] = cvPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[0].y)/2);
00327                         pts[3] = cvPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[2].y)/2);
00328                         pts[4] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[1].y+im[2].y)/2);
00329                         pts[7] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[3].y+im[0].y)/2);
00330                         pts[8] = cvPoint(0, (im[7].y+im[4].y)/2);
00331                         pts[11] = cvPoint(0, (im[5].y+im[6].y)/2);
00332                         pts[12] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[6].y)/2);
00333                         pts[15] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[7].y+im[4].y)/2);
00334                 }
00335                 else {
00336                         pts[0] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[3].y+im[0].y)/2);
00337                         pts[3] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[1].y+im[2].y)/2);
00338                         pts[4] = cvPoint(0, (im[1].y+im[2].y)/2);
00339                         pts[7] = cvPoint(0, (im[3].y+im[0].y)/2);
00340                         pts[8] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[7].y+im[4].y)/2);
00341                         pts[11] = cvPoint(doc->cameramodel.w-1, (im[5].y+im[6].y)/2);
00342                         pts[12] = cvPoint(0, (im[5].y+im[6].y)/2);
00343                         pts[15] = cvPoint(0, (im[7].y+im[4].y)/2);
00344                 }
00345                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[0], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00346                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[4], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00347                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[8], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00348                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, &pts[12], NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00349                 CvPoint v1[] = {pts[0], pts[1], pts[9], pts[8]};
00350                 CvPoint v2[] = {pts[2], pts[3], pts[11], pts[10]};
00351                 CvPoint v3[] = {pts[4], pts[5], pts[13], pts[12]};
00352                 CvPoint v4[] = {pts[6], pts[7], pts[15], pts[14]};
00353                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v1, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00354                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v2, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00355                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v3, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00356                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, v4, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00357         }
00358         else  {
00359                 CvPoint poly1[] = {im[0], im[1], im[2], im[3]};
00360                 CvPoint poly2[] = {im[4], im[5], im[6], im[7]};
00361                 CvPoint poly3[] = {im[0], im[1], im[5], im[4]};
00362                 CvPoint poly4[] = {im[1], im[2], im[6], im[5]};
00363                 CvPoint poly5[] = {im[2], im[3], im[7], im[6]};
00364                 CvPoint poly6[] = {im[3], im[0], im[4], im[7]};
00365                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly1, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00366                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly2, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00367                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly3, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00368                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly4, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00369                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly5, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00370                 cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly6, NPTS/2, color, CV_AA);
00371         }
00372 }
00373 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00374 void Cuboid::RasterizeFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00375         CvPoint pf1 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[0]);
00376         CvPoint pf2 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[1]);
00377         CvPoint pf3 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[2]);
00378         CvPoint pf4 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[3]);
00379         CvPoint poly[] = {pf1, pf2, pf3, pf4};
00380         cvFillConvexPoly(frame, poly, 4, color, CV_AA);
00381 }

00389 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00390 CvPoint3D32f Cuboid::GetCenter() {
00391         CvPoint3D32f center = cvPoint3D32f(0,0,0);
00392         for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++) {
00393                 center.x += v[i].x;
00394                 center.y += v[i].y;
00395                 center.z += v[i].z;
00396         }
00397         center.x /= NPTS;
00398         center.y /= NPTS;
00399         center.z /= NPTS;
00400         
00401         return center;
00402 }

00405         return doc->cameramodel.coordsDistanceFromCamera(GetCenter());

00427 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00428 void Cuboid::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00429         
00430         if( archive.IsStoring() ) {
00431                 archive << label << id;
00432                 for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++)
00433                         archive << v[i].x << v[i].y << v[i].z;
00434         }
00435         else {
00436                 archive >> label >> id;
00437                 for (int i=0;i<NPTS;i++)
00438                         archive >> v[i].x >> v[i].y >> v[i].z;
00439         }
00440 }
00441 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00442 template <> void AFXAPI SerializeElements <Object3D*> ( CArchive& ar, Object3D** p, INT_PTR nCount )
00443 {
00444     int i; 
00445     if (ar.IsStoring()) 
00446                 for (i=0; i<nCount; i++)
00447                         p[i]->Serialize(ar); 
00448     else 
00449                 for (i=0; i<nCount; i++) { 
00450                         p[i] = new Cuboid();
00451             p[i]->Serialize(ar); 
00452                 }
00453 
00454 }
00455 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00456 bool Cuboid::IsFramePointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00457         for (int j=0;j<Cuboid::NPTS;j++) {
00458                 CvPoint vertex = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(v[j]));
00459                 if(d(point, vertex) <= DOT) {
00460                         pcurrent = v[j];
00461                         return true;
00462                 }
00463         }
00464         return false;
00465 }
00466 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00467 bool Cuboid::IsFloorPointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00468         for (int j=0;j<Cuboid::NPTS;j++) {
00469                 CvPoint vertex = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(v[j]);
00470                 if(d(point, vertex) <= DOT) {
00471                         pcurrent = v[j];
00472                         return true;
00473                 }
00474         }
00475         return false;
00476 }
